citation.title: Effects of a reduction in the number of short intervals between work shifts on heart rate variability: A prospective field study of female nurses

news.title: Longer breaks between shifts promote nurses’ recovery from work
news.summary: Reducing short breaks between shifts helps nurses recover from work, according to a new study from Finland. The study analysed the effects of longer rest and recovery periods between shifts on heart rate variability, which is an indicator of recovery. Shif
